title: Team Boss Blasts Chris Froome for Claiming Bad Bike-Fit Contributed to Lack of Results
content:
'That's still not going to earn him a position on a grand tour team': Sylvan Adams shows no mercy on former Tour de France dominator.

Read the full article at Team Boss Blasts Chris Froome for Claiming Bad Bike-Fit Contributed to Lack of Results on Velo.
